Update **persistent_peers** setting in **config.toml**. Stale peers can cause node inefficiency over time. This script selects up to 5 random live peers:

```
PEERS=07549afbf828447b903e3eeb483157c68ee1f5ba@65.109.38.100:24656,139b644e51d18ed786a536f127f44cc3bd515501@162.55.92.79:13656,cb6ae22e1e89d029c55f2cb400b0caa19cbe5523@172.111.52.53:32677,e4855d41f3e66d961215d48ac8eabe309cfd4437@135.125.67.241:26616,c59dff7e20c675fe4f76162e9886dcca9b5104ce@135.181.238.38:28156,3c6030644552136161026d8343db498d27cc510e@88.198.52.46:28156,c0715da9d20a37416570a3f9ae7da903e86dcca0@148.251.86.17:28156,04d761ac4bc40b3683ee5434bfc68252780fff9c@35.214.170.219:26656,6a665f4a2cafa099eb3badd5ab79b4c5e5201d1c@65.109.58.189:28156,25f16167fb89ef4d7f67750426c78284397ba11e@135.125.180.4:26656,4105533d7322bc72427358f6b0e89e4592396c10@65.109.117.113:28556,b52ad356bbce3de91f7b7dbb5f3dda1d2c4f7e2c@65.108.224.110:26656,32558d10482b3b0afc5aecebd18c2f30f9f4847b@129.213.101.84:26656,83169458663fbcea2429ad62697c56d7d30f80d8@5.161.97.184:26656,9fbad38add614fcf060b9dc2495fb9c6b3d21ab5@206.125.33.62:26666,b600e57c7d851e0ab7f3cbe581866848ba4ebea3@65.109.58.86:28156,9958da8755b37cc3502e7bdfcd4bdf4db6079161@65.109.93.124:28556,ee3a6bb0f6645bd067db6e913a312ce84919d5e4@135.125.180.235:26656,b40ef61221e436c286dd4c1deeed991f8c985b5f@65.21.10.115:28156,c3d05b15dc431239ee48cb691d294a947e5e286c@65.108.29.197:11020,5f337e1944aa1f209c3b9c364b98adbe1af31b6f@216.18.205.178:26656,1f0910e8021748d24c943359b4f89c91800597e0@185.180.222.76:26656,cdc5d792a78929976b0a34a75b9e154237dc95b6@45.84.197.173:26656

```

Add Citizen Web3 state-sync peer to **persistent_peers** in **config.toml**:

